definition: to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc

pinyin: qian2 bu4 pi2 ceng2 xia4 sun3 shang1
ji1 di3 shen2 jing1 jie2 sun1 sun3 shang1
pi2 ceng2 xing4 shi4 sun3 shang1
shen2 jing1 xing4 shi4 sun3 shang1

sentences.english: Direct fetal injury is an infrequent complication of blunt trauma.
sentences.chinese: 胎儿直接损伤是钝器伤的罕见并发症。

sentences.english: Is it true that lack of iodine really causes brain damage?
sentences.chinese: 缺碘是否真的会造成脑损伤？

sentences.english: To investigate clinical feature and therapeutic approach of traumatic dural sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨外伤性颅内静脉窦损伤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: Finally, some advice was put forward on the research directions of FOD tolerance design technology in China.
sentences.chinese: 最后对我国外物损伤容限设计的研究方向提出了建议。

sentences.english: An elephant can uproot a tree or pick a flower without bruising a petal.
sentences.chinese: 大象能够拔起大树，或者摘下小花而不损伤花瓣。

sentences.english: Most muscle and spinal injuries are from overstrain .
sentences.chinese: 大多数肌肉损伤和脊椎的问题都来自用力过度。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of high frequency ultrasound in diagnosis of trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高频超声对跟腱损伤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Conclusion The above procedure is necessary for the ankle sprains with the injury of the common peroneal nerve.
sentences.chinese: 结论踝扭伤出现腓总神经损伤者应作探查松解减压术。

sentences.english: Globe rupture can occur secondary to blunt or penetrating trauma.
sentences.chinese: 眼球破裂可继发于钝挫伤或穿透性损伤。

sentences.english: Patricia Neal raised money for children and adults who had suffered brain injuries.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里夏尼尔谁提出的儿童和成年人遭受脑损伤的钱。

sentences.english: RESULTS Ischemia enhanced cell proliferation in DG of adult rats.
sentences.chinese: 结果缺血性脑损伤可促进成年大鼠齿状回的细胞增殖。

sentences.english: Objective:Research Qiwei safflower Shushen powder on the protective effect of liver injury.
sentences.chinese: 本论文研究七味红花殊胜散对肝损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Xenon lung scans may be helpful in the early diagnosis of inhalation injury.
sentences.chinese: 氚肺扫描可能有助于早期诊断吸入性损伤。

sentences.english: Objective It is discussed that the effect of tetrandrine to the eye injury caused by free radical.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨汉防己甲素对自由基眼损伤的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of maltol(MT) on cerebral ischemia and reperfusion damages in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究麦芽醇对大鼠脑缺血再灌注损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective therapy of acute injury of lung caused by indirect cause morbi.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨间接病因致急性肺损伤的治疗。

definition: to make heavier/to emphasize/(of an illness etc) to become more serious/to aggravate (a bad situation)/to increase (a burden, punishment etc)
to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
